posts.post_content: Interesting how haste is becoming a ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) ability... 3 power for 3 mana that can attack straight away is a good deal in limited, and I think Scavenge is a good mechanic - not broken, and can lead to some strategic choices later in the game.
